gamblingauthoritiy

Interface IBetLoggingAuthority

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BetLoggingAuthority

    public interface IBetLoggingAuthority

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logAddAcceptedBet(Bet acceptedBet, BettingRoundID bettingRoundID, GamingMachineID gamingMachineID)
      this method logs an accepted bet by a BettingRound.
      void logEndBettingRound(IBettingRound endedBettingRound, BetResult result)
      this method logs when a BettingRound ends.
      void logHandInGamblingCard(GeneralID card, java.util.Set<BetID> betsMade)
      this method logs the PlayerCard which is turned in by a Gambler.
      void logHandOutGamblingCard(GeneralID card)
      this method logs when a PlayerCard has been handed out to a Gambler.
      void logStartBettingRound(IBettingRound startingBettingRound)
      this method logs when a BettingRound starts.

    • Method Detail

      • logHandOutGamblingCard

        void logHandOutGamblingCard(GeneralID card)
        this method logs when a PlayerCard has been handed out to a Gambler.

        it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

        this method MUST be used when a gambling card is handed out by the cashier.

      • logHandInGamblingCard

        void logHandInGamblingCard(GeneralID card,
                           java.util.Set<BetID> betsMade)
        this method logs the PlayerCard which is turned in by a Gambler. All betID's on it are logged by the authority.

        it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

        this method MUST be used when a gambling card is handed in at the cashier.

      • logStartBettingRound

        void logStartBettingRound(IBettingRound startingBettingRound)
        this method logs when a BettingRound starts. It should be called before any submitted bets are added to a betting round.

        it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

        this method MUST be used when a betting round is started.

      • logAddAcceptedBet

        void logAddAcceptedBet(Bet acceptedBet,
                       BettingRoundID bettingRoundID,
                       GamingMachineID gamingMachineID)
        this method logs an accepted bet by a BettingRound. It should be called: after startBettingRound is called, before endBettingRound is called

        it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

        this method MUST be used when an accepted bet is added to a betting round.

      • logEndBettingRound

        void logEndBettingRound(IBettingRound endedBettingRound,
                        BetResult result)
        this method logs when a BettingRound ends. It should be called after the winner of a betting round has been decided. all information in the betting Round are logged by the authority.

        it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

        this method MUST be used when a betting round has ended and the winner is determined.
